mobileResponsivenessTip: Ensure text size and touch targets are optimized for smaller screens to improve mobile user experience.
loadingSpeedTip: Compress images and use lazy loading for non-critical resources to speed up page loading time.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve title tags and meta descriptions to better reflect key content for search engines.
userExperienceTip: Streamline navigation and minimize pop-ups to enhance overall user experience.
bookingFlowTip: Simplify the booking process by reducing the number of steps and offering clear progress indicators.
tips: Improve the clarity of calls to action (CTAs) on the homepage.
Ensure accessibility features like alt text for images and screen reader compatibility.
